price: Bẹ́ẹ̀ ni, Òun (nìkan) lẹ máa pè. Ó sì máa mú (ìnira) tí ẹ̀ ń pè É sí kúrò (fún yín) tí Ó bá fẹ́. Ẹ̀yin yó sì gbàgbé ohun tí ẹ̀ ń fi ṣẹbọ sí I.
arabic: بَلۡ إِيَّاهُ تَدۡعُونَ فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَدۡعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوۡنَ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: bal iyyāhu tadʿūna fayakshifu mā tadʿūna ilayhi in shāa watansawna mā tush'rikūna
